Cisco

Projects

Sports Betting Arbitrage

Typically odds across different sports betting sites differ slightly. Individuals can take advantage of them by hedging all positions in a sports event on two different platforms with distinct odds in such a way as to make a profit.

View Project

Black Scholes Option Pricing Visualizer

Given inputs, the program calculates call/put option prices using the Black Scholes pricing model. There are also heatmaps for volatility in relation to price as well as graphics for all greeks.

View Project

Geospatial Positioning with Landmark Recognition

Our project uses a database of famous landmarks and their surroundings. It uses an algorithm rooted in algebra and trigonometry in order to determine the relative position of the camera in relation to the landmark.

View Project

F1 Prediction Analysis

The F1 Race Predictor is a machine learning-based tool designed to predict race outcomes based on historical data, qualifying results, and weather conditions.

View Project
